AppicationSubmissionInfo.FormAndInfoAndMaterials: APPLICATIONS SHOULD BE SUBMITTED IN WRITING, TWO PAGES OR LESS. ALL APPLICATIONS MUST CONTAIN A BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE ORGANIZATION AND ITS MISSION, A GRANT PURPOSE STATEMENT (I.E., A DESCRIPTION OF THE PROGRAM FOR WHICH THE GRANT IS BEING REQUESTED AND THE NEED OR PROBLEM ADDRESSED BY THE PROGRAM). THE APPLICANT MUST SUBMIT COPIES OF THE ORGANIZATION'S IRS DETERMINATION LETTER OF 501(C)(3) STATUS AND ANY STATE DOCUMENTATION OF EXEMPT STATUS. APPLICANT SHOULD BE PREPARED TO SUMBIT BUDGET SUMMARIES AND RELATED FINANCIAL RECORDS IF REQUESTED.
AppicationSubmissionInfo.SubmissionDeadlines: ALL APPLICATIONS SHOULD BE SUBMITTED BY OCTOBER 31ST OF EACH YEAR.
AppicationSubmissionInfo.RestrictionsOnAwards: THE FOUNDATION'S PRINCIPAL FUNDING AREAS ARE: EDUCATION (KINDERGARTEN THROUGH 12TH GRADE), WOMEN & CHILDREN, AND THE ENVIRONMENT. THE FOUNDATION'S GEOGRAPHICAL FUNDING AREA IS LIMITED TO LOS ANGELES COUNTY, WITH THE EXCEPTION OF ENVIRONMENTAL GRANTS AND OTHER SPECIFIC NEED GRANTS AS DETERMINED APPROPRIATE BY THE BOARD. ORGANIZATINS BASED OUTSIDE THE COUNTY WILL BE CONSIDERED, BUT ONLY IF THEIR PROGRAM(S) PROVIDE SERVICES WITHIN THE LOS ANGELES COUNTY AREA
